title: Ecommerce DTC Video Editor
job_overview:
Looking for a creative and long-term video editor to produce high-quality creatives for our ecommerce brand. Focus on storytelling, pacing, and the style will range from organic UGC-style to more direct VSL-style editing.

???? Key Responsibilities
? Edit UGC & raw footage into engaging, high-converting direct response ads
? Applying platform-native editing styles: fast-paced cuts, captions, and strong hooks
? Collaborating with the creative team to iterate based on ad performance

? Requirements
Experience & Skills:
? 1+ year editing videos for performance marketing
? Portfolio of UGC-style or native platform video ads
? Understanding of direct response principles: hooks, retention tactics, CTAs
? Comfortable following briefs while contributing your own creative input

Software Proficiency:
? Strong in CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, or equivalent
? Ability to edit efficiently and meet tight turnaround times
? Familiarity with AI-driven tools (e.g., ElevenLabs, HeyGen, Kling) to streamline voiceovers & avatars

Bonus Experience (Preferred But Not Required):
? Familiarity with VSL-style videos or longer-form ads
? Understanding of creative testing, ad iterations, and using performance to guide iterations

???? Pay Structure & Workload
This role will start as part-time, with an hourly workload based on available projects (typically 15–25 hours/week). If we’re a good fit and you deliver consistent, high-quality work, we’ll offer growth into a full-time position (40+ hours/week) with weekly deliverables, steady income, and higher bonuses.

Compensation:
? Up to $12/hour full-time based on experience & efficiency
Performance bonuses:
? $50-150 bonus for ads that hit $1k-10k ad spend at 2.0+ ROAS

???? How to Apply
If you're a performance-minded editor who knows how to make conversion-driven content, we'd love to work with you.
To apply:
? Share your portfolio or link to relevant work
? Include your expected salary for part-time (15-25 hours/week) & full-time (40+ hours/week)
? List software & tools you’re proficient in

? Important: Include the phrase “Almond” in your application so we know you read everything!
